Hi,

How do I configure a bigger BloomUriUniqFilter? I read 
http://crawler=
.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?BloomUriUniqFilter
It says the default value s=
hould handle 125M inserts and uses 500M of 
memory. 

What does 125M insert=
s mean? Does that mean I can have 125M URL 
downloaded with 1 in 4M error r=
ate? (that's about 30 dups in 125M?)

What if I have 800M of memory to spar=
e, what would be new parameters 
in terms of

org.archive.crawler.util.Bloo=
mUriUniqFilter.expected-size
org.archive.crawler.util.BloomUriUniqFilter.ha=
sh-count

Cheers,
-Joe
